title: Wonderful staff
desc: Lovely hotel, central location and excellent facilities. But the best thing about this hotel are the wonderful staff who go above and beyond to help their guests. We are late in reviewing the hotel due to my husband suffering with a serious health condition and having to be admitted to hospital for most of our stay. The staff were so helpful and supportive of our situation, and we would like to say thank you, especially to Leon, who without his support I don’t think we would have managed to get home. Happy to say my husband is now fully recovered and we hope to visit your lovely hotel again soon.

title: had an amazing time!
desc: We had the most amazing welcome at this hotel. The staff was super friendly and helpful. Especially sir Henry. He was so kind to us and took care of everything. He answered every question we had and even walked with us to a place we wanted to see. The rooms were also very clean and the hotel’s breakfast was really nice. Overall an 7.5/10 experience but Henry made it an 10!

title: Kinda disappointing
desc: Henry is friendly only when we are checking out but not during our stay.. Kinda pressuring us to write an good review with his name on it. I mean we dont mind writing for him if he being helpful for our entire stay. But not being friendly only when he want us to write an review...

title: Complete hotel!
desc: Good hotel for you traveling to Singapore. Good location. Has a nearby 2 MRT station, Money Changer, mini market, and bus station. All complete. Easy to go anywhere. And the service is also good. One of the staff named Hendri gave us a very good service. Very kind and have a lot of info.

title: Twin room stay
desc: Came here via mrt and hotel was next to mrt station.Staff kelli served me well and allowed me rooms next to each other.Kelli always greeted is and is kind and friendly Room though small but were clean

title: Rm 509 update
desc: Staff very helpfull, the location is grest. Near Masjid for muslim very good ! Nearby have bencoolen and bras basah statiioms which are so good and convenient We were really happy we chose this hotel and will return

title: Unprofessional staff
desc: We stayed here for 1 night because the location is good (just beside mrt). However, we arrived early before check in time and was advised they can accomodate us but they need a shout out and review for the hotel. The staff at reception got our phone and made the review on his own without our consent. Even putting 5 star for cleanliness even if it's not. Very unprofessional! Never going back here.

title: Henry the great!
desc: We came for F1 2023 Grand Prix weekend and we experienced some of the best hospitality that we will truly never forget. Henry the service king helped us every single day and didn’t hesitate in helping us get directions to all our requests and even made sure we had complimentary breakfast! Truly felt the warmth and hospitality Singapore has to offer. You must stay here whenever you decide to come to Singapore!

title: 3 nights in V Hotel
desc: Joined my family for 3 nights stay here. Came with my wife for a holiday which my family stayed here for the past few days, so decided to join them. The room is quite small but their service and cleanliness is tip top. The service from the counter is great as well. Staff Jason is helpful with the directions and given us a F1 map! Thanks!

title: For formula F1
desc: Came here for the formula 1 weekend. Perfect location, right in the centre of everything. Staff was super helpful, friendly and hospitable. Rooms are cleanly and fairly priced. Henry The Great was eager to help us with everything from key locations to visit and how to get there to brining our luggage up to the room. Very knowledgeable staff and understand what a tourist would need to make their stay comfortable.

title: Basic hotel
desc: Stayed here for 1 night in September. This is a very basic hotel with tiny rooms. It is a bit away from the hustle and bustle, but walkable. Positive thing is the price compared to a lot of hotels. We left an Amazon Kindle in the room, but apparently housekeeping has not found it - oh well...
